product_description: The Large Peace Lily (Spathiphyllum Sensation) is elegance and calm in plant form. With lush, green leaves and graceful white blooms, it instantly brightens up living rooms, bedrooms, or office corners. Known as one of the best natural air purifiers, this large Peace Lily not only uplifts your décor but also helps you breathe fresher, cleaner air every day. Despite its grand size, it’s easy to care for - thriving in low light and needing only moderate watering. If you’re looking for a statement plant that’s both beautiful and fuss-free, the Peace Lily is the one to bring home.

The Peace Lily plant is a stunning indoor flowering plant with dark, glossy green leaves and occasional pearly white flowers that put any competitors to shame. Known to be one of the best air-purifying plants, the Peace Lily is a wonderful indoor companion with a fuss-free attitude and low maintenance requirements. It is also fairly fast-growing, making it the perfect lush plant for indoor displays.

Easy to grow and care for, the Lucky Bamboo 3 layered plant is a popular indoor plant because of more reasons than just its care requirements. According to Feng Shui, this is one of the best lucky plants for homes, and its reputation as such greatly adds to its charm and allure. Additionally, it is also a great gifting option that works as a personal pick-me-up!

Are you a sucker for succulents? Then the Mini Jade succulent will be your dream plant! As one of the easiest houseplants to look after, the Crassula Green Mini plant boasts a lush foliage which beautifies any room. The Jade is also considered lucky as per Feng Shui for its coin-like round plump leaves. So, go ahead and bring Jade home… luck just tags along!

Looking for a unique addition to your home garden? Then the Dracaena fragrans Brazil Wood plant is just what you need! At first glance, this plant may not specifically stand out.But the more you get to know about it, the more you will gravitate towards it. This stunning Dracaena is just a wooden log at first but as you nurture it, it grows stunning leaves from different nodes that sprout wonderfully. This can then grow in height as well and become the most beautiful plant you’ve seen, giving you a unique and lush display in your home or garden.
Breathable white lace dress—comfortable for casual day looks and errands.

Named aptly after its habit of growing rapidly when unchecked and wandering to the ends of the earth if left to its own devices, the Wandering Jew is an easy plant to grow indoors. Also known as Spiderwort, the Wandering Jew plant is used both in hanging baskets and also as ground cover. The stunning leaves are striped in shades of purple, adding instant color to your garden. Fuss-free and super easy to care for, this plant is stunning in its hanging planter and does well in brightly lit areas.

The hanging Sedum Golden plants are golden-green, tufty perennial plants with spike-like yet soft leaves clustered on thick stems. These stunners grow horizontally rather than vertically and are popularly planted in clusters. In hanging planters, they trail down from tufty mounds giving them a fantasy movie-like feel. Their foliage is attractively golden making them eye-candy for anyone looking to add some minimalist plants to their home décor.

Growing English Ivy indoors is pure unadulterated joy with its quirkily shaped leaves that are both glossy and fleshy. The variegations appear along the leaf in irregular shapes in milky white. The leaves grow profusely on rapidly spreading vines and will easily climb walls and race across ground. They grow exceedingly well in containers and look beautifully tropical and lush in hanging planters.

If you love succulents, you will love the Peperomia Variegated. With its waxy and fleshy leaves and unique green and white variegations that change with time and light, it is good addition for tabletops or small spaces and its olive green leaves also provide good contrast. The peperomia needs very little help to make your space look lively.

Commonly known as the Heartleaf Philodendron, the hanging Philodendron Oxycardium Green is a wonderful indoor plant that effortlessly adds a tropical charm to any indoor space. Low maintenance and non-demanding, this tropical plant is an absolute crowd-pleaser with its lush green foliage and glossy, heart-shaped leaves. Beautiful and fuss-free - what more could a plant lover want!

Are you just getting started in the world of indoor plants and gardening? Well, then the hanging Spider Plant is just what you need! Low maintenance and easy to grow, this stunning and timeless indoor plant is perfect for new and experienced gardeners alike. With its delicate, spikey leaves that provide a calming aesthetic indoors, this versatile plant also fits in with all kinds of home decor and displays. Moreover, this stunning indoor plant is NASA-certified for its unbeatable air purifying qualities!

Introducing the Jade Creeper Plant in a Hanging Planter—a stunning addition to your garden! Its vibrant green leaves cascade beautifully, adding a touch of natural beauty to any space. Easy to care for, this plant thrives in bright, indirect light and requires only occasional watering. Perfect for new and experienced gardeners alike, it’s low-maintenance and drought-tolerant. Ideal for hanging planters, it creates stunning displays indoors or outdoors. With air-purifying qualities, it not only beautifies but also freshens your home. Elevate your garden with the Jade Creeper Plant in a Hanging Planter!

Well we all know where Popeye got his strength from and he was not exaggerating. A perennial, it takes very well to growing in pots. This green leafy superfood is packed with nutrients, vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants that offer a wide range of health benefits! Easy to cook and tasty when raw, the spinach is one of the easiest things to grow.

Cherry tomatoes are small round tomatoes that grow on a stem similar to how grapes do andare a great addition to salads, pastas, or salsa for a mouthful of flavour. Rich in antioxidants and numerous nutrients they are a growers joy. Extremely easy to grow, and apart from tasting great they also add a nice colour to your garden!

Broccoli is a cruciferous vegetable belonging to the cabbage family and we’ve got to say - it doesn't get greener and healthier than this! This nutrient dense superfood is loaded with calcium, Vitamin C, antioxidants, fibre, and folate. Whether you’re looking for delectable taste or nutrient-dense health, this food has it all. The best part is that Broccoli seeds are super simple to grow once you understand them, often known for germinating within just 6-8 days. Moreover, within 90-110 days, you will be able to reap a full and beautiful broccoli harvest in your own home garden!

If India had a national herb, it would be coriander. Put it in salads or curries as garnish, in sandwiches as chutney, or even snacks to enhance the flavour, there is nothing better than coriander. Famous across the globe as cilantro, it forms an integral part of several world cuisines too. It is also one of the quickest and easiest to grow herbs.

What is Italian cooking without basil. This easy to grow plant forms and integral part of Italian cuisine owing to its unique flavour profile and numerous health benefits. It has antimicrobial properties and is used as a home remedy in several ailments. In cooking, add it to sauces, pastas, spreads or simply garnish with it to enjoy its flavour.

Bring serenity and beauty into your home with Ugaoo Lotus Seeds, perfect for growing stunning aquatic flowers in small water bowls, balconies, or backyard ponds. These high-germination, 100% natural seeds make growing lotus plants easy and rewarding. Just soak the seeds, and within weeks, you’ll witness graceful, vibrant blooms that symbolize peace, purity, and renewal. Whether you want to create a Zen-inspired meditation space or simply add an elegant touch to your garden, Ugaoo Lotus Seeds are the perfect choice!

Every plant needs a planter with drainage holes and this means that there is inadvertently a need for drainage trays. The plastic tray is made from highly durable and 100% recyclable plastic material that can take the load of the heaviest plants without any damage. It's all-weather proof nature means that it can be used both indoors and outdoors without any issue. Its matte finish, premium grade plastic, and neutral colors of black and terracotta means that they go well with every coloured planter. The drainage tray is molded to the right size to fit their respective planters and have just enough depth to avoid spillage but not promote water stagnation. Use the plastic trays under your indoor planters and outdoor planters to avoid water spillage onto the floors and keep your garden clean.

Made of premium-grade plastic, this reusable seedling tray is the perfect solution for all your plant propagation and seed germination requirements. The pot is the perfect size for optimum root growth and with well-placed drainage holes for proper drainage. The tray can be used as is or can be separated into individual planters for single use. The planter can be washed and reused time and again for several propagation and germination cycles.

Introducing the Maze Ceramic Pot - a premium quality ceramic planter that is sure to add a touch of contemporary style to your indoor or outdoor space. Crafted from the finest quality ceramic material, this pot boasts a glossy glazed finish that oozes sophistication and class. The evergreen shape of this pot makes it a versatile piece that will blend seamlessly with any decor style. But what really sets it apart is the mesmerizing geometric Maze inspired surface details that bring a modern twist to your plant display.The Maze Ceramic Pot is designed with a drainage hole that promotes healthy plant growth by preventing overwatering. The ceramic base plate is included to catch any excess water and keep your floors or surfaces clean and dry.

Transform your living spaces with the Golden Goblet Opulence, a premium metal planter designed for those who appreciate the finer things in life. The smooth metal and goblet or tall bowl shape create an air of opulence, making it a standout choice for indoor plant enthusiasts. Elevate your home decor with this golden-hued masterpiece, where form meets function in a symphony of style and sophistication.

Crafted from premium wood, the Ridged Waves Wooden Pot features an elegant wave-like texture that adds depth and character to any space. Perfect for holding plants, flowers, or decorative accents, this versatile pot blends natural charm with timeless design

Add zen to your garden with our pebble shaped planter. Designed to be a part of the Japanese Zen garden, our pebble planters look stunning as a part of landscaped gardens. The planter is extremely lightweight and durable in all weather conditions and can be used both as an indoor planter as well as an outdoor planter. The pebble planter i made of completely recyclable polymers that lend it both strength and a realistic stonefinish. The pebble planters look especially stunning next to a fountain or a waterbody in outdoor gardens or lobby to replicate a riverside or beachside scene.

The watermatic stake is an automatic watering system for plants around your home - both indoor and outdoor. The watering system can be used for foliage plants. flower beds, as well as vegetable gardens. The watering system is need based and each plant is watered individually as per its requirements resulting in a healthy plant and also water conservation. It reduces your daily watering needs and allows you to go on vacations without worrying about your plants. The watermatic stake is easy to use and install and can be used all year round for your indoor and outdoor garden.

Trellis Plant Support Stands, a versatile set of 3 stands designed to provide sturdy support for climbing plants in your home garden. Crafted with precision and durability in mind, these plant support stands not only offer practicality but also enhance the aesthetic appeal of your green space. Create a thriving haven for your climbers and creepers with the Ugaoo Trellis Plant Support Stands.

The Bent Scraper is small in size and lesser weight. It’s an ideal tool for light work around the garden and farms, such as removing small weeds and shrubs. It has a superior quality blade that performs its task with speed and ease. It is a great tool for women and young adults.

The Ugaoo Heavy Duty Anvil Pruner features a hardened steel blade that is used to remove thicker stems and branches along with solid steel handle with a plastic grip for a powerful and comfortable hold. It is ideal for pruning stems and dry, woody branches.

This garden sprayer features an adjustable dual-mode nozzle for maximum water pressure and efficient water flow, making it ideal for urban areas with low water pressure. The provided hose quick connectors are suitable for various garden accessories and ensure consistent water pressure and spray. The solid brass construction of the hose nozzles and connection nozzle guarantees durability, while the leak-proof design ensures a tight seal to eliminate leaks. The spray nozzle has an attractive one-piece structure with an easy-to-install design that saves time and effort. Overall, this high-quality garden sprayer is a reliable choice for long-term use.

This classy and effective creation is just what you need to help your plants grow the healthiest with the perfect watering schedule! Crafted to blend right in with your garden, the Ugaoo watermeter works on Japanese technology and is equipped with the flawless ability to check moisture levels in potted plants and tell you the correct time to water your plants. Simply insert the pen-like equipment into the soil and it will speak for your plants. The blue colour indicates that the plant is perfectly watered, whereas the white colour on the watermeter tells you that the plant needs to be watered. Thanks to the watermeter, your plants will never suffer from overwatering or underwatering again!
